title: Spotted: An Updated Cannondale Supersix EVO SE Gravel Bike Under Ted & Laura King
content:
Ted and Laura King appear to be riding a new Cannondale gravel bike, with SRAM UDH and lots of Supersix Evo influence.

Read the full article at Spotted: An Updated Cannondale Supersix EVO SE Gravel Bike Under Ted & Laura King on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
